summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4073 for the improvement of Orcas Street, from 42nd Avenue South to a point 100 feet east of Renton Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 49022, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
